amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease the Veterans Health Administration (VHA) account by $10 million to reinforce the importance of strengthening the VHA's Office of Mental Health and its work to assist veterans with disabilities and mental health and substance abuse challenges.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Molinaro amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
